name: GunCat (Demo)
description:
GunCat is a 2D platformer where you play as a gun-wielding cat that tries to make it's way through a laboratory filled with zombies.

Controls:
WASD - move
Space - Jump (Hold Space to jump higher)
S - Crouch
Left Click - Shoot
Esc/Tab - Pause
R - Restart

GunCat is my first attempt at making a small game project.  It was made for a college assignment and it's not meant to be a full game or a demo of one, it was mostly supposed to serve as a learning experience at making game art assets and animations.
It is just one short level, it's very rough around the edges and probably not that fun to play, but considering I'm not planning to work on it any further anytime soon, I figured it wouldn't hurt to share it publicly, to show off the work i did.

Credits:
Artistic Supervision & Programming - Miłosz Margański
Art & Animation - Graskip

Music used:

Nul Tiel Records - Ebb and Flow
